sentence: A book is given to each student in the class.
Option A: In total, more than one book is given.
Option B: In total, one book is given.

sentence: A new episode is released every week.
Option A: Different episodes are released each week.
Option B: The same episode is released every week.

sentence: A gift is given to each employee at the end of the year.
Option A: In total, more than one gift is given.
Option B: In total, one gift is given.

sentence: A different dish is served each day of the week.
Option A: There are more than two dishes served in total.
Option B: There are exactly two dishes served in total.

sentence: A new song is played every hour on the radio.
Option A: The same song is played every hour.
Option B: Different songs are played each hour.
